home.title: Hello, I'm Le Hoang Quan
home.subtitle: 11th grade student (Math class) at High School for the Gifted - VNUHCM
home.about: My passion for technology stems from the inspiration and belief that technology can make human life simpler and more interesting. Nothing satisfies me more than learning and observing new technologies, and from there finding and thinking of new directions that are suitable for myself in the future.

diligence.title: Diligence

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: I believe that when faced with any problem in life, I can overcome it and prove my uniqueness.
